mcq.statement: What was the main economic strategy of the Swadeshi Movement started in 1905?

options.c: Boycotting foreign products and using Indian products

mcq.one_liner: The Swadeshi Movement, initiated in 1905, was an economic strategy to **weaken the British Empire by boycotting foreign products and promoting Indian goods**.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
